items.sentence: I\'ve tried calling Tom all day, but the line is busy.
Would you tell Tom why you don\'t want him to do that?
Tom and I used to play together when we were children.
Tom asked Mary to go to Boston with John next weekend.
Tom wanted me to tell you he needs to borrow your car.
Why don\'t you come in for a cup of coffee and a chat?
Why don\'t you do something constructive for a change?
Why don\'t you stay here for a couple of days with us?
How did you come up with the idea for this exhibition?
Are our kids doing what they\'re supposed to be doing?
